players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob is dead. We need to figure out who did this. I'm a villager and have no special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to share your thoughts and observations."
Diana: "I'm also a villager. Alice, since you're claiming villager too, that leaves Charlie as the only one who hasn't spoken yet. We should hear from him."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso. My investigation confirms it. We must vote her out now before she kills again tonight."
You: "Charlie claims Diana is the mafioso based on an investigation. Diana, can you confirm or deny this? If Charlie is lying, he's the mafioso. If he's telling the truth, Diana is."
Diana: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Alice last night - she is a villager. Charlie must be the mafioso trying to frame me."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
